item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Mitch McConnell: ‘We’re in a very, very dangerous world right now’
2. The department of flags: Syrian rebels lay bare Assad’s corrupt state
3. [Opinion] The western myth of the ‘guy we can do business with’
4. Qatar’s $500bn wealth fund targets bigger deals as LNG windfall looms
5. Pay UK bosses like football stars, says Lord Spencer
